PHRASE.LANG: You and your Jungle Crawler have created a strong bond and it will follow you all over PlayStation®Home! [#Legal]
Grâce au lien fort qui s'est créé entre votre jungle crawler et vous, il vous suivra partout dans PlayStation®Home! [#Legal]
Du hast eine starke Bindung zu deinem "Dschungel-Crawler" aufgebaut. Er folgt dir in PlayStation®Home überallhin! [#Legal]
Tu e il tuo Crawler Giungla avete stretto un forte legame e da adesso ti seguirà per tutto PlayStation®Home! [#Legal]
¡Tu quad de jungla y tú habéis desarrollado un fuerte vínculo y te seguirá por todo PlayStation®Home! [#Legal]
*Not Localized* You and your Jungle Crawler have created a strong bond and it will follow you all over PlayStation®Home! [#Legal]
정글 탐험가는 당신과 깊은 유대 관계를 형성했습니다. 이제 PlayStation®Home 어디든 당신을 따라 다닐 겁니다! [#Legal]
You and your Jungle Crawler have created a strong bond and it will follow you all over PlayStation®Home! [#Legal]
你和你的森林攀岩車已經建立了深厚的感情。無論在PlayStation®Home的任何地方，它也會跟隨你！ [#Legal]
